doc:
Howard Gaye https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_Gaye 0 Howard Gaye (23 May 1878 – 26 December 1955) was a British actor who worked mainly in the United States. He acted in 27 silent films including Robert E. Lee in Birth of a Nation (1915) and Jesus Christ in D. W. Griffith's Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages (1916). Howard_Gaye ( 23_May_1878 – 26_December_1955 ) was a_British_actor who worked mainly in the_United_States . He acted in 27_silent_films including Robert_E._Lee in Birth of a_Nation_(_1915_) and Jesus_Christ in D._W._Griffith 's_Intolerance : Love 's_Struggle Throughout the_Ages ( 1916_) .
